root_object.name: AS GAM Sync Internal User Data

process_model.name: AS GAM Sync Internal User Data
process_model.description: A nightly sync that will sync Appian users to provided user table

nodes.node_name: Get inactive users and total count

inputs.input_expression: = { usernameList: index( pv!inactiveUsers, enumerate( min( cons!AS_GAM_INT_USER_SYNC_USERNAME_BATCH_SIZE, rule!AS_GAM_UT_ArrayLength(pv!inactiveUsers) - ( (pv!loopIncrement - 1) * (cons!AS_GAM_INT_USER_SYNC_MNI_BATCH_SIZE * cons!AS_GAM_INT_USER_SYNC_MNI_BATCH_SIZE) + (tp!instanceindex - 1) * cons!AS_GAM_INT_USER_SYNC_USERNAME_BATCH_SIZE ) )) + (pv!loopIncrement - 1) * cons!AS_GAM_INT_USER_SYNC_MNI_BATCH_SIZE * cons!AS_GAM_INT_USER_SYNC_USERNAME_BATCH_SIZE + 1, {} ), entityMap: pv!entityMap}

= { usernameList: rule!AS_GAM_UT_GetUsersForSyncProcess( returnDeactivatedUsers: false, instanceIndex: tp!instanceIndex, loopIncrement: pv!loopIncrement, entityMap: pv!entityMap, group: pv!group ), entityMap: pv!entityMap}

constants.name: AS_GAM_PM_ADD_USERS
constants.description: Value: AS GAM Add User to User Table

data.value: AS GAM Add User to User Table

called_by: AS GAM Sync Internal User Data

constants.name: AS_GAM_GRP_ALL_BUSINESS_USERS
constants.description: Value: AS GAM All Business Users

constants.name: AS_GAM_INT_USER_SYNC_MNI_BATCH_SIZE
constants.description: Value: 100 - This is used to only kick off 100 child processes at a time, which should be easier on the engines than kicking off 1,000 at once.
called_by: AS GAM Sync Internal User Data

constants.name: AS_GAM_INT_USER_SYNC_USERNAME_BATCH_SIZE
constants.description: Constant for number user in a child process to be ran: 25
called_by: AS GAM Sync Internal User Data

constants.name: AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_DATA_SUBSET
constants.description: DATA_SUBSET - Returns a type of DataSubset when passed to rule `AS_CO_UT_queryEntity`

constants.name: AS_CO_INT_QUERY_MAX_BATCH_SIZE
constants.description: Value: 1000 - The maximum size to pass to all queries to avoid accidentally querying too much data

expression_rules.name: AS_CO_UT_isBlank
expression_rules.description: Evaluates if the provided value is empty/blank. Returns True or False.

test_cases.test_name: Array cast to Any Type with first value null

expression_rules.name: AS_GAM_UT_ArrayLength
expression_rules.description: Gives length of an array based on input of array
called_by: AS GAM Sync Internal User Data

expression_rules.name: AS_GAM_UT_getAllDeactivatedAppianUsers
expression_rules.description: Gets all of the deactivated users in Appian
called_by: AS GAM Sync Internal User Data

expression_rules.name: AS_GAM_QE_getUser
expression_rules.description: Returns user CDT based on the entity, entityType, and given filter set.

expression_rules.name: AS_GAM_UT_GetNumOfUsersForGroup
expression_rules.description: Taking an input of a group, return total count of that group
called_by: AS GAM Sync Internal User Data

expression_rules.name: AS_CO_UT_rejectNullValuesFromArray
expression_rules.description: Removes null values from an array of primitive types or CDTs (for CDT the index must be null, not each field)

expression_rules.name: AS_GAM_UT_GetUsersForSyncProcess
expression_rules.description: Gets the users needed for syncing
called_by: AS GAM Sync Internal User Data

expression_rules.name: AS_CO_UT_queryEntity
expression_rules.description: Helper rule to execute queries with minimal overhead, pass `returnType` based on the query purpose

expression_rules.name: AS_GAM_UT_GetNumOfLoopsForSync
expression_rules.description: Taking an input of a number of users for syncing, determine loops
called_by: AS GAM Sync Internal User Data

expression_rules.name: AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank
called_by: AS GAM Sync Internal User Data
